metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12467 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Authorized users of the openbuildservice before 2.9.4 could delete packages by using a malicious request against projects having the OBS:InitializeDevelPackage attribute, a similar issue to CVE-2018-7689.

criterions.comment: open-build-service: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
